room_title: Escape room "The Meltdown" by Clever Clues Escape Room in Detroit
review: First escape room that I've been to and it was a blast! Everyone had a great time. We did the more difficult "Meltdown" room and there were several puzzles that required us to divide-and-conquer. It was also nice that they had an employee in the room with us to give little hints here and there. The hints were not dead giveaways either, just a little push in the right direction. I'd definitely come back to try the other room.
